name: Face To Space
description:
This game is a memory of those old space shooters that many loved to play in childhood. Nothing complicated - just fly forward and destroy enemy ships. On the way there will be buffs such as an increase of attack speed, an increase of movement speed,  and the hp regen. Enemies will appear more and more often, so try to score the maximum number of points and have a good time listening to cool dynamic music.

Controls: Use ARROWS on keyboard to move and SPACE to shoot.

This project is my introduction to Godot Engine and I hope you will like it. All the sprites were drawn by me and the soundtrack was written by my friend. Thanks for background to Deep-Fold.
